title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Short-Term Intensive Digital Literacy Development Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and understanding of foundational educational theories
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can integrate at least three types of digital tools applicable to educational settings (e.g., quiz platforms, collaboration tools) into actual lesson designs
Participants can submit digital lesson designs that apply the TPACK framework’s principles of integrating technology, content, and pedagogy
Participants can write reports evaluating the usefulness and ease of use of digital tool adoption based on the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
